title: Charlotte of Mecklenburg-Strelitz
summary: Charlotte of Mecklenburg-Strelitz (Sophia Charlotte; 19 May 1744 â€“ 17 November 1818) was Queen of Great Britain and Ireland as the wife of King George III from their marriage on 8 September 1761 until the union of the two kingdoms on 1 January 1801, after which she was Queen of the United Kingdom until her death in 1818. As George's wife, she was also Electress of Hanover until becoming Queen of Hanover on 12 October 1814, when the electorate became a kingdom.
